featured.text: They emphasize the participants’ athletic achievements 27 their physical disability.
To emphasize the importance of the Swiss army knife.
The new study emphasizes that pain has both physical and psychological elements.

definition.zh_def: 強調，突出某事的重要性或特徵。
definition.en_def: To give special importance or prominence to something.
definition.example: The teacher emphasized the importance of studying for the exam.
